title: "What Will You Learn in the Milan Level One Course on Hypnosis and Magnetism?"
first_phrase: This text describes a 5-day course called COURSE LEVEL ONE MILANO which covers various hypnosis exercises and techniques, taught by expert trainers. The final part of the text discusses the exercises covered on day five, which mainly includes Mirror exercise for pain, General exercise of letting go, and Indian Self Hypnosis. The text also mentions the relevant names, such as Arkeos Lafontaine, Hypnogenic points, Regression, and Campanelli techniques. The course seems to cover basic to advanced level hypnosis techniques, which can be beneficial to aspiring hypnotists.

last_phrase: Congratulations on completing the Level One Hypnosis Course in Milan! You've learned an extensive range of techniques, including magnetic passes, induction techniques with a person sitting, and exercises for regression and heightening reactions. You've also gained a comprehensive understanding of animal magnetism and the power of presence. Use these impressive skills to help your clients overcome compulsions and phobias, and experience the transformative power of self-magnetism. Keep practicing exercises like the magnetic massage and the Blue Pearl exercise to achieve a healthier and empowered state of being.
